entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
